item.title: Rolled around town with Babaji and Paola
item.description: 13:01 Tuesday 04 October 2016 JST I showed up at Paola’s with a gift of playing Jenga. Gift not delivered, but instead we went on an adventure via taxi to カンノンジ (I have no idea about the kanji now) where a room is open to allow viewing of a statue for a deity whose name I’ve forgotten. Thanks to S for letting me shift our meeting time to 1pm from noon.
